comment.body:
Since you have to run the commands quickly in sequence you could use:
`
$ pulseaudio --kill && qjackctl & && pulseaudio
`
Alternatively you can set autospawn=no on pulse's config file or use: `pasuspender -- qjackctl`
Of course the service file is a much better long term solution.

Very nice article! Hoping to see the next chapter soon!
